section.para: A deal is structured for a company by a bank or group of banks to meet the company's financial needs. A deal consists of one or more facilities.

section.title: Deals Landing Page
section.para:
The deals landing page displays all the deals that the logged in user has access to. You can select a deal to list all the associated facilities. You may also initiate a drawdown on an active facility.
You can customise the list of columns displayed through SDK.
The following image illustrates the Deals landing page:

You can personalize the Deals Landing Page to suit your requirements. Click Personalize to add, delete or reposition widgets using drag and drop feature. Once the modifications are made on the dashboard click Save or Save As. The individual functionality of Save and Save As are described below:
Save: Click on this button to save the updates on the personalised dashboard. You can also rename the existing dashboard with new changes. This option is available only for personalised dashboards and not for dashboards provided by default.
Save As: Click on this button to save the dashboard as a new personalised dashboard. This option is available for dashboards provided by default and also for already created personalised dashboard. Use this option when you wish to save a new personalised dashboard
The saved dashboard can be viewed and selected from the User Profile Panel.
